paper_abstract: The hypermeshes are a family of promising optical interconnection topologies for multiprocessor systems. This paper is concerned with the conditional diagnosability of hypermeshes under the comparison model. We prove that, for n >= 3, k >= 4, the conditional diagnosability of k(n)-hypermesh is 3n(k - 1) - 2k - 1. This result shows that the hypermeshes possess strong self-diagnosing ability. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Conditional diagnosability of hypermeshes under the comparison model
